question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [go up the building and fly to the left near the lake. stop at the middle of the lake and turn up and left and prepare for take off. go over the trees and bushes until you see the fountain. go over the fountain and over one building until you see the edge of the ocean. turn around and head towards the spotted lake and land near the trees. turn around and continue straight and over the red tree. turn around and continue straight.]. At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of movement instructions. When you reach the current location, what is your Landmark Position from the lake?  
choose:  
A. I am on the right side of the lake.  
B. I am far away from the lake.  
C. I am above the lake.  
D. I am on the left side of the lake.  
E. I am below the lake.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The current location, as depicted in the frames, shows a view of the city and the lake from a high vantage point, indicating that the agent is far away from the lake rather than being on any side or above it.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(26, 50)]
Option: [B]
Reason: From the video, especially between 26s and 50s, the camera pans out to show a wide view of the city and the lake. The lake is visible, but it's in the distance, indicating that the agent is far away from it.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The current location, as depicted in the frames, shows a view of the city and the lake from a high vantage point, indicating that the agent is far away from the lake rather than being on any side or above it.
